703253f-a.text:
(1) Boerum Place, at the S.E. corner of State Street, showing St. Mary's Syrian Orthodox Church of Antioche.  January 26, 1930.  P.L. Sperr.

(2) The same, as seen from Boerum Place.  January 26, 1930.  P.L. Sperr.

(3) The same, from a different angle.  January 26, 1930.  P.L. Sperr.
